The claim alleges that Andrew Gillum: the mayor of Tallahassee, refused help from utility workers after Hurricane Hermine struck the city.
The expert: s verdict also highlights the responsibility of Rob McGarrah, the city's general manager of utilities, to identify the needs and coordinate with other utilities.
The head of the Florida Municipal Electr: Barry Moline, refutes the claim and states that the mayor had no involvement in rejecting crews, calling it a "flat-out lie."
